meanings.definition: A group or set of eight things.
meanings.sent1: The ogdoads of crayons in the box were all different colors.
meanings.sent2: She counted the ogdoads of cupcakes on the table before the party.
meanings.sent3: The ogdoads of puppies running around the yard caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The ogdoads of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The ogdoads of books on the shelf created a colorful display.

meanings.sent1: He learned to write the number eight as '8' in school.
meanings.sent2: The clock struck eight, signaling the start of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The eight balloons formed an ogdoads floating in the air.
meanings.sent4: She found eight seashells on the beach, an ogdoads of treasures.
meanings.sent5: The ogdoads of fingers on his hands made it easy to count to eight.
